The '''Kingdom of the Rock''' was one of the independent kingdoms of [[Westeros]] until the [[War of Conquest]]. It was founded during the time of the [[First Men]] by [[House Casterly]], the builders of [[Casterly Rock]].

Following the [[Andal Invasion]], the Kingdom of the Rock became ruled by [[House Lannister]], who descended from the Andal invaders and, through the female bloodline, the mythic [[Lann the Clever]] who, according to legend, swindled Casterly Rock from the Casterlys. The Lannisters ruled as [[King of the Rock|Kings of the Rock]] until [[Aegon the Conqueror]] invaded [[Westeros]]. King [[Loren Lannister]] joined forces with [[Mern Gardener]], [[King of the Reach]], to wage war against the invaders. However, their forces were obliterated in the [[Field of Fire]]. While Mern perished, King Loren submitted to Aegon and the Kingdom of the Rock became one of the constituent regions of the unified [[Seven Kingdoms]].
